overview: Brad Schildt is the co-founder and Executive Vice President of TimeView. Brad co-founded BioPay with Tim Robinson, directed BioPay’s strategic planning and operations until the time of the sale to Pay By Touch, and then worked on integrating BioPay and Pay By Touchâ€™s operations. Prior to BioPay, he launched CheckAGAIN with Tim Robinson and managed its development and operations. Prior to CheckAGAIN, Brad was instrumental in the start-up ACS Merchant Services, where he created and managed the customer service, technical support, and POS Debit departments of the credit card acquiring business. He also held various management roles at The Bank of Boulder in risk management, product development and customer service. Brad was a former member of NACHA’s Electronic Check Council and VISA and MasterCard’s debit product operations committees. Brad holds a B.A. in Economics from Middlebury College, and spent 4 years post college working nights in restaurants, while rock climbing, skiing and traveling. His spare time now is spent training for and racing in triathlons.
